name: Huckleberry Youth Programs
description: 24-hour crisis intervention and resolution services and emergency shelter to high-need youth between the ages of 11 and 17. Huckleberry House may house 18-year-olds who are enrolled in high school or GED program.
fullDescription: 24-hour crisis intervention and resolution services and emergency shelter to high-need youth between the ages of 11 and 17. Huckleberry House may house 18-year-olds who are enrolled in high school or GED program.
